Class ActionCard

java.lang.Object
Card
ActionCard
public class ActionCard
extends Card
This class defines the ActionCard object. The ActionCard is a card with an event that makes the player do something.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    double AMOUNT
    This attribute contains the card's monetary value, to be used by its events.
    java.lang.String NAME
    This attribute contain's the player's name.
    int TYPE
    This attribute contains the card's type, which ranges for the following values: 0 - Make the player collect from the bank this card's value 1 - Make the player pay the bank this card's value 2 - Make the player pay another player this card's value 3 - Make the player collect money from another player this card's value

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ActionCard​(int type, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
    This constructor initializes and randomly assigns this card its name and amount.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void event​(Player player)
    This event executes the actions to be done by this card.
    java.lang.String toString()
    This method converts this ActionCard data to its string representation.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • NAME

      public final java.lang.String NAME
      This attribute contain's the player's name.

    • TYPE

      public final int TYPE
      This attribute contains the card's type, which ranges for the following values: 0 - Make the player collect from the bank this card's value 1 - Make the player pay the bank this card's value 2 - Make the player pay another player this card's value 3 - Make the player collect money from another player this card's value

    • AMOUNT

      public final double AMOUNT
      This attribute contains the card's monetary value, to be used by its events.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionCard

      public ActionCard​(int type, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      This constructor initializes and randomly assigns this card its name and amount. The list of players is needed when the active player needs to choose another player to do an action.
      Parameters:
      type - : int
      players - : ArrayList of Player

  • Method Details

    • event

      public void event​(Player player)
      This event executes the actions to be done by this card. This implements the abstract method in the Card class that automatically gets called when a player lands on this space.
      Specified by:
      event in class Card
      Parameters:
      player - : Player to be performed events on.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method converts this ActionCard data to its string representation.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      data : String
